::Scyther::

Scyther walks into the shuttle as it opens, looking around. He smiles.

"This'll work with no problem," he says and then mutters a 
transformation command. Seconds later, a perfect replica of a Maximal 
elder stands in the shuttle, matching everything down to the spark 
signature.

"Allright, I'm ready for takeoff," he says to Chamaleon in the 
Maximal's voice.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> :: Chamaleon::
> 
> Chamaleon nodded 
> 
> "Just you have to let shuttle circuits show you the way to leave 
> base's area..." said the bot "It will take few cycles... the 
shuttle 
> will be lead by our Main computer, the computer will find the 
closest 
> and safest exit. Out side, you'll take the control... good luck"
> 
> Chamaleon walked towards a control panel and typed some commands... 
a 
> door started opening and all was ready to let the shuttle take off.
